name: LD52 - Crop Rotation
description:
Made for LD 52 - Harvest

Crop Rotation is a pure drafting game. All cards will be auto-played.

Each day is split into 12 hours. Each hour you will 

  1. Harvest the crop in the current selected plot if it is matured.
  2. Play the next card. Crop will only be planted if the plot is empty.
  3. All Plant will grow if there are enough water in the plot.

At the end of each day, you will need to play rent or you lose. Rent is capped at 60.

Each Crop card has 4 stats.

  1. Value - This is the base value of the crop, which is the amount of gold you earned when you harvest it.
  2. Water - The amount of water needed for it to grow each hour.
  3. Number of hours required for growth
  4. Number of hours before it will wither after it is matured.
